title: CONTRIBUTION
description: Documents a Contribution (change set) of one or more versions added to a change-controlled repository.

versions.description: Set of references to versions causing changes to this EHR. Each contribution contains a list of versions, which may include paths pointing to any number of VERSIONABLE items, i.e. items of type COMPOSITION and FOLDER.

audit.description: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this Contribution.
